name: MathHelp
0:
”Alexa open math help.”
”Alexa launch math help.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math help
des:
Have Alexa help you with math problems!

You can choose the operation and specific number you would like to work on. This skill can provide help with addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division. It can be used for these operations on any number or for mixed problems.

After providing a math quiz with ten problems, Alexa will give you a summary of your results and review any problems that you missed.

To launch, simply say, "Alexa, open Math Help."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
